geodata-desc: Adds geographical coordinates storage and retrieval functionality
geodata-bad-input: Invalid arguments have been passed to the <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki> function
geodata-multiple-primary: <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki>: cannot have more than one primary tag per page
geodata-limit-exceeded: The limit of $1 <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki> {{PLURAL:$1|tag|tags}} per page has been exceeded
geodata-broken-tags-category-desc: The page has a malformed {{#coordinates:}} tag.
geodata-unknown-type-category: Pages with unknown type of coordinates
geodata-unknown-type-category-desc: The page uses an unknown value of the type parameter for coordinates.
geodata-unknown-globe-category-desc: The page uses an unknown value of the globe parameter for coordinates.
geodata-unknown-region-category-desc: The page uses an invalid value of the region parameter for coordinates.
geodata-api-help-coordinates-format: Format: Latitude and longitude separated by pipe (<kbd>|</kbd>).
geodata-search-feature-invalid-coordinat: The geo coordinates '$2' provided to '$1' could not be parsed.
geodata-search-feature-invalid-distance: The geo distance '$2' provided to '$1' could not be parsed.
geodata-search-feature-unknown-title: The title '$2' provided to '$1' does not exist.
geodata-search-feature-title-no-coordina: The title '$2' provided to '$1' does not have any coordinates.
geodata-search-timeout: GeoData search timed out. Only partial results are available.
